I will write down all my grievances against Mr.  Honey Singh.  1. His lyrics. Omg what should I say? Aaj blue hai (paani)x10^infinity or phone, charger rakhle, roti bhindi pack kar among many nonsensical others. I mean it's good to have high aims in life but if he's seriously aiming to win a Grammy one day then he has to improve the quality of his lyrics a lot.  2. His portrayal of women. Like seriously? Kudi namkeen? Choti dress mei bomb lagti mainu? 3. His attitude. This dude has surely got an attitude problem. If he thinks he can insult bigwigs such as Eminem, Enrique Iglesias and Ludacris and get away with it, I'm sorry but I don't see that happening. Besides he needs to distinguish between facts and fantasy for the reality is that he is in no way a better singer than any of these.  All things said, I would like to add that his music is kind of good and if I ignore the lyrics(which requires quite a lot of effort) I like the beats but if he works a bit on them, they could be quite nice actually.
